altername_name: SuperLite 1500 Series: A Ressha de Ikou Z: Mezase! Tairiku Oudan
name: A Ressha de Ikou Z: Mezase! Tairiku Oudan
overview: A Ressha de Ikou Z - Mezase! tairiku oudan (ak A-Train Z) was released in May 1999 for the Playstation 1 console and it was re-released on the PSP in June 2006. The version Z features 3D view of the city and trains, different trains, rails and cities. The goal is to make the biggest train empire and the game ends when the player run out of money.
